mapper.select: SELECT ALIMG, ALTITLE, ALARTIST, TO_CHAR(ALDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ALDATE, ALGENRE FROM ALBUMS GROUP BY ALTITLE, ALIMG, ALARTIST,ALDATE, ALGENRE ORDER BY ALDATE DESC

SELECT ALCODE, ALIMG, ALTITLE, ALPRICE, ALSALEPRICE, ALARTIST, TO_CHAR(ALDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ALDATE, ALINFO, ALGENRE, ALSCORE, ALLIST, ALSITE FROM ALBUMS WHERE ALTITLE = #{altitle} ORDER BY ALDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS(ODCODE, ODMID, ODALCODE, ODQTY, ODPRICE, ODDATE, ODADDR) VALUES (#{odcode},#{odmid},#{odalcode},#{odqty},#{odprice},SYSDATE,#{odaddr})
